body.name: Mueller 12-Cup Drip Coffee Maker - Borosilicate Carafe, Auto-Off, Reusable Filter, Anti-Drip, Keep-Warm Function, Clear Water Level Window Coffee Machine, Ideal for Home or Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 4 mins
features: Generous Capacity & Durable Design: Glass carafe with 60oz capacity, this allows you to brew a large amount of coffee up to 12 full cups, or simply choose 2 or 4 at a time. It has an easy-grip handle for comfortable, drip-free pouring. The dishwasher safe carafe coffee pot is made of high-quality, non-porous borosilicate glass, which won’t absorb odors, while its superb heat-resistance will keep your coffee hotter for Ionger.

Reusable Eco-Filter: Our permanent filter technology not only enriches the flavor of your coffee but also saves you the cost and waste of disposable filters. Easy to remove and clean, however filter paper can still be used if you prefer. Savor the flavor in every refill.

Improved Keep Warm Safety: Our keep-warm function maintains your coffee's temperature, ensuring your last cup is as warm as the first. After your machine has brewed a fresh carafe of coffee, the warming plate will retain heat, and then will automatically turn off after 2 hours. Perfect for busy mornings or leisurely brunches.

Thoughtful Features: The Mueller coffee machine comes with a non-drip carafe and non-slip feet for stability, ensuring your brewing experience is clean and safe. Cord storage keeps your counter tidy, reflecting the machine's sleek design.
Superior Quality With Mueller - We are here to offer you only the best quality products designed to make your life easier. If you need any help, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With 60 fl.oz. capacity, you can brew up to 12 cups of coffee, or just 2 or 4 in the mornings when time is tight! Enjoy flavorful brews at home or in the office, or gift it as a housewarming present! Our coffee maker lets you enjoy your perfect cup of coffee with just one press! Start a brew, pause mid-brew for an impromptu cuppa, or keep warm. Don’t settle for a cold cup of joe. The automatic keep warm feature lets you savor every sip without sacrificing flavor. Plus, for added safety, the coffee pot will automatically turn off after 2 hrs. The Coffee Maker Carafe is crafted with high-quality borosilicate glass that won't absorb odors and is completely dishwasher safe! Plus, you can conveniently wash and reuse the filter time after time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love My New Coffee Maker!
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, easy to clean, has both options for filters; comes with a permanent one, or you can remove it and use the paper ones. It is large capacity, so I can brew just a few cups or up to 12 large cups. Has an automatic turn off, so no need to worry about burnt coffee or burned down house. Takes up very little counter space. The electric cord could be a bit longer, but works fine for me. It brews deliciously tasting coffee in no time at all. No fuss no muss. Nothing fancy, just good coffee maker. Good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, is simple to use, clean, and works great!
reviews.reviewText: I like the ease of use, one button on/off switch, and the warming plate to keep coffee warm. The filter basket is nice too, but I prefer the disposable coffee filters, which are compatible as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a deal!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice coffee maker. It is simple to use, not a lot of bells and whistles to figure out. I like the coffee it makes and I like the fact it stays warm for a good length of time. It is easy to clean as well. For the price you can't beat it..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy on the pockets
reviews.reviewText: Title: Excellent Value for Money!Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐I recently purchased this Coffee Maker for a mere $20, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations! Here's why I think it deserves four stars:1. Affordability: At such an affordable price point, this coffee maker is an absolute steal. It offers tremendous value for money, making it perfect for budget-conscious coffee lovers or those looking for a backup coffee maker.2. User-Friendly Design: It's incredibly easy to use, even for a coffee novice like me. It features a simple on/off switch and a clearly marked water reservoir, eliminating any confusion during setup. The compact size is also a plus, as it doesn't take up much counter space.3. Speed and Efficiency: This coffee maker brews my coffee in no time! Within minutes, I have a hot and delicious cup of coffee ready to kickstart my day. It saves me precious minutes during hectic mornings when every second counts.4. Decent Taste: While it may not produce coffee at the level of high-end machines, the Muellers Coffee Maker still delivers a decent cup of joe. The coffee is flavorful and satisfying, providing a pleasant morning pick-me-up or an afternoon caffeine boost.Overall, it's an excellent choice for those seeking an affordable and reliable coffee maker. It may not have all the bells and whistles of more expensive models, but it gets the job done efficiently and delivers a satisfying cup of coffee. For its price range, it's truly a gem and deserves a solid four-star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best coffee makers I've ever had! Durable/high quality/not pricey. Awesome features!
reviews.reviewText: This 12-cup coffee maker is seriously one of the best I've ever bought, and that includes some of the better-known name brands. The 2-hour auto shut-off is really convenient, as well as the awesome feature of just "toggling" the on/off switch to quickly re-heat what's left in the pot! Well-made and extremely reasonable. I'd recommend to anyone and would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This super simple coffee pot has been durable and does the job! I had bought this one after my other randomly broke, I am so happy that I did! It’s super user friendly and comes with a reusable filter so there’s no need to buy filters! You can get about 12 cups from this one. If you’re looking for a simple and budget friendly coffee pot this one is the way to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use
reviews.reviewText: After reading some of the other peoples reviews, I was a little skeptical however, I am very pleased with this unit. It’s lightweight. It’s easy to use and the timer for the two hours does work. There’s only one button you turn it on and it does turn off in two hours,One thing I wasn’t liking too much was you have to pour the coffee or water slowly out of the pot because it will drip but other than that it’s a great little coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly the coffee maker that I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coffee maker after my previous one finally broke. I was specifically looking for a few key features which this coffee maker had. I wanted a coffee maker that had a mechanical On/Off switch, and I wanted a coffee maker that did NOT automatically shut off after a period of time. The reason I wanted these features is because I am slowly but surely turning my home into a “smart home” and I have been wanting to automate as many things as I can. Surprisingly at the time I was looking at this coffee maker I don’t believe there was a coffee maker with native Apple HomeKit compatibility. To my knowledge as of October, 2023 there still isn’t. That wasn’t a big deal, because I have a smart outlet that I plugged the coffee maker into. Now I can have the coffee maker turn on and start brewing coffee at whatever time I set up the automation for, so that when I finally get out of bed the coffee is already brewing. Yes, I could have done that with an automatic coffee maker that has a built-in timer, but this is great because I can program the outlet to turn on/off at various times or set up stipulations that someone has to be home in order for it work (preventing the coffee maker from doing its thing when we are away from home and forgot to turn off the auto feature on other coffee pots that we have had.)I also really appreciate the fact that it doesn’t auto shutoff after 2 or 4 hours. I know that is meant to be a safety feature, but with my smart home it is an unnecessary feature. I have an automation set up that when the last person leaves home it shuts the outlet off. Normally I don’t assume that the automation will work, but in case I forget it will take care of it for me.Another feature, and I am not sure if this was a deliberate feature or not, but I have noticed that when it is brewing, occasionally it will pause brewing for a short time (maybe 30-45 seconds??) and that is good, because it allows me to pick up the coffee pot when it is still brewing and pour myself a cup if I am too impatient to wait for it to finish. It DOES have “pause and pour” meaning that there is a check valve that shuts off the flow to the carafe so that the coffee doesn’t just continue to keep pouring out on to the burner, but with this pause there is typically ZERO drips. May sound like a little thing (and truthfully it is), but that little drip gets on to the burner and the water quickly evaporates leaving coffee residue which I would have to clean up later. If I wait until the brewing temporarily pauses on its own then I prevent even a single drip. Like I said it is a small thing, but it is just one more small little thing that makes me really like this coffee pot even more.It is so ironic in a day and age when things are getting more technical and more sophisticated that I would willingly choose a coffee pot that is as simple as it can possibly get. I have had coffee makers that were far more sophisticated, but in the end I want to be able to control the coffee maker via my smart home and not have the coffee maker control itself.Lastly, I wanted to mention that the coffee pot is very reasonably priced at just under $30. The fact that I got a good quality coffee maker that is exactly what I was looking for and it also was among the lowest price that Amazon had to offer is a win-win for me! I have zero regrets buying this coffee maker. Actually, that’s not true — I wish I would have bought it sooner! If you’re on the fence, go ahead and get it — it’s a beautifully simple coffee pot which is exactly what I was looking for!
